name: test
description: This table captures the details of financial transactions processed in the system, including amounts, dates, accounts, and other transaction-specific metadata.

columns.name: amount
columns.description: The total amount involved in the transaction.

columns.name: amount_base
columns.description: The base currency amount of the transaction.

columns.name: amount_dwh
columns.description: The amount as stored in the data warehouse, possibly adjusted for reporting.

columns.name: currency
columns.description: The currency in which the transaction is denominated.

columns.name: post_date
columns.description: The date on which the transaction was posted.

columns.name: post_time
columns.description: The time at which the transaction was posted.

columns.name: sym_run_date
columns.description: The date when the system processed the transaction.

columns.name: value_date
columns.description: The date on which the transaction is considered effective.

columns.name: value_time
columns.description: The time at which the transaction is considered effective.

columns.name: cr_dr_ind
columns.description: Indicator of whether the transaction is a credit or debit.

columns.name: reversal
columns.description: Indicates if the transaction is a reversal of a previous transaction.

columns.name: status
columns.description: The current status of the transaction.

columns.name: branch_no
columns.description: The branch number where the transaction was processed.

columns.name: vkb_branch_no
columns.description: The virtual branch number associated with the transaction.

columns.name: acct_no
columns.description: The account number associated with the transaction.

columns.name: cr_acct_no
columns.description: The account number credited in the transaction.

columns.name: dr_acct_no
columns.description: The account number debited in the transaction.

columns.name: client_no
columns.description: The unique identifier for the client involved in the transaction.

columns.name: gl_code
columns.description: The general ledger code associated with the transaction.

columns.name: reference
columns.description: A reference number for the transaction.

columns.name: vikki_transaction_id
columns.description: An internal identifier for the transaction.

columns.name: client_transaction_id
columns.description: An identifier for the transaction provided by the client.

columns.name: narrative
columns.description: A narrative or description of the transaction.

columns.name: user_id
columns.description: The ID of the user who processed the transaction.

columns.name: accept_user
columns.description: The ID of the user who accepted or approved the transaction.

columns.name: tran_type
columns.description: The type of transaction being processed.

columns.name: dlh_transaction_code_domain
columns.description: The domain code for the transaction type.

columns.name: dlh_transaction_code_family
columns.description: The family code for the transaction type.

columns.name: dlh_transaction_code_subfamily
columns.description: The subfamily code for the transaction type.

columns.name: profit_centre
columns.description: The profit center associated with the transaction.

columns.name: seq_no
columns.description: A sequence number for ordering transactions.

columns.name: source_module
columns.description: The module from which the transaction originated.

columns.name: source_type
columns.description: The type of source that initiated the transaction.

columns.name: trade_no
columns.description: The trade number associated with the transaction.

columns.name: dlh_gl_code_description
columns.description: The description of the general ledger code.

columns.name: source_system
columns.description: The system from which the transaction originated.

columns.name: originating_account_id
columns.description: The ID of the account from which the transaction originated.

columns.name: eod_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp marking the end of day processing for the transaction.

columns.name: insert_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the transaction record was inserted into the database.

columns.name: instruction_details
columns.description: Details of any instructions associated with the transaction.

columns.name: batch_details
columns.description: Details of the batch in which the transaction was processed.

columns.name: dlh_created_time
columns.description: The time when the DLH record was created.

columns.name: dlh_partition_date
columns.description: The date used for partitioning DLH data.

columns.name: dlh_source
columns.description: The source from which the DLH data was obtained.

columns.name: dlh_processed_time
columns.description: The time when the DLH data was processed.

columns.name: dlh_backdate_enabled
columns.description: Indicates if backdating is enabled for the transaction.

columns.name: dlh_backdate_start
columns.description: The start date for backdating the transaction.

columns.name: dlh_backdate_end
columns.description: The end date for backdating the transaction.

columns.name: dlh_backdate_reason
columns.description: The reason for backdating the transaction.

columns.name: dlh_processing_mode
columns.description: The mode in which the transaction is processed.

columns.name: dlh_invocation_id
columns.description: The ID of the invocation that processed the transaction.
